summary: Systematic bug reproduction, root cause analysis, fix, and verification

subtasks.description: Reproduce the bug: Test bug for E2E. Navigate to orchestration CLI and follow reproduction steps: . Capture screenshots, console errors, and network requests as evidence.

phases.name: Trace

subtasks.description: Trace root cause of bug: Test bug for E2E. Analyze orchestration CLI codebase. Use console errors and stack traces from reproduction phase. Identify the exact symbol and line causing the issue.

phases.gateCondition: root cause identified in memory ANALYSIS_*

phases.name: Fix

subtasks.description: Fix bug: Test bug for E2E. Apply fix to symbols identified by analyst. Expected behavior: . Ensure type safety and no regressions.

phases.gateCondition: typecheck passes AND fix implements expected behavior

phases.name: Verify

subtasks.description: Verify fix for: Test bug for E2E. Confirm bug no longer reproduces using same steps: . Run regression tests on orchestration CLI. Capture evidence that expected behavior:  now works.

phases.gateCondition: bug no longer reproduces AND regression tests pass
